description: The Devold® Alnes Sweater is a more modern classic, designed by the Italian designer Olmes Carretti in 1995. The pattern is inspired by the original designs from the 1800s. Besides its retro look and feel, this sweater will keep you warm without overheating. Knitted in 100% virgin wool, it is naturally insulating, wicking and breathable, and will keep you warm even if you are wet.
name: Alnes Wool Roll Neck - Unisex
